name: The Dolls: Reborn
description: In the darkness they sing in the darkness they sway. The toys that had been swept away want to play, And you are now the toy...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
